backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two homepage-related features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark OKLCH theme tokens and global background/text behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with six main routes and renders them via RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper providing TopNav, routed content, Discord CTA, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Discor: Discord call‑to‑action card linking to the marketing content’s Discord URL.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FAQSec: FAQ accordion section populated from marketing content with animated reveal.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Featur: Feature grid displaying Minecraft‑style icon cards pulled from marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FinalC: Final call‑to‑action card linking to Plans and About using marketing content copy.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with branding, nav links, and social icons driven by marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero section showing updated headline/subheadline and a single Get Started button linking to /plans.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Motion: Component that reveals children with a fade/slide animation when entering the viewport, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Pricin: Renders the pricing section using marketing content, showing plan cards with animations and CTAs.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Layout wrapper providing consistent section padding, container sizing, and optional ID.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Displays testimonial cards with animated reveal using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TopNav: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll styling, mobile menu, and CTA using marketing content.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Static configuration object containing navigation, hero text, features, pricing, and testimonials for marketing pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and custom utility/component styles with Minecraft‑inspired UI classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with animated marketing sections for mission, vision, and story using mc-card components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage from hero, features, social proof, and final CTA marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Full marketing landing page combining top nav, multiple feature sections, pricing, FAQ, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/MorePage.tsx: Displays FAQ and a resource list using mc-card components with animations.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentMethodPage.tsx: Shows payment methods and security details using marketing content and animated mc-card layouts.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Simple page rendering the PricingSection with spacing.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewPage.tsx: Page that displays social proof testimonials via SocialProofSection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors from CSS variables, adding plugins, custom shadows, keyframes, and fonts.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and configuration for updating homepage hero content and CTA.
